Package neqsim.pvtsimulation.util

Class BlackOilCorrelations

java.lang.Object
neqsim.pvtsimulation.util.BlackOilCorrelations
public final class BlackOilCorrelations extends Object
Black oil correlations for estimating PVT properties.

This class provides industry-standard empirical correlations for:

  • Bubble point pressure (Pb)
  • Solution gas-oil ratio (Rs)
  • Oil formation volume factor (Bo)
  • Dead oil viscosity
  • Live oil viscosity (saturated and undersaturated)
  • Gas formation volume factor (Bg)
  • Gas viscosity
  • Oil compressibility

Supported correlations include:

  • Standing (1947)
  • Vasquez-Beggs (1980)
  • Glaso (1980)
  • Petrosky-Farshad (1993)
  • Beggs-Robinson (1975) - viscosity
  • Lee-Gonzalez-Eakin (1966) - gas viscosity

Unit Support: All core methods use field units (psia, °F, scf/STB, cP). For SI/NeqSim units, use the overloaded methods that accept a BlackOilUnits parameter, or use the convenience "SI" suffix methods (e.g., bubblePointStandingSI).

Author:
ESOL
See Also:

    • bubblePointStanding

      public static double bubblePointStanding(double Rs, double gammaG, double gammaO, double T, boolean useAPI)
      Standing correlation for bubble point pressure.
      Parameters:
      Rs - Solution GOR at bubble point (scf/STB)
      gammaG - Gas specific gravity (air = 1)
      gammaO - Oil specific gravity (water = 1) or API gravity if useAPI=true
      T - Temperature (°F)
      useAPI - If true, gammaO is treated as API gravity
      Returns:
      Bubble point pressure (psia)

      Returns:

      Returns:
      Bo in bbl/STB (dimensionless ratio, same in all units)

      public static double oilFVFUndersaturated(double Bob, double co, double p, double pb, BlackOilUnits inputUnits)
      Calculate undersaturated oil Bo with unit support.
      Parameters:
      Bob - Bo at bubble point
      co - Oil compressibility (in inputUnits: 1/psi for FIELD, 1/bara for SI/NEQSIM)
      p - Current pressure (in inputUnits)
      pb - Bubble point pressure (in inputUnits)
      inputUnits - Unit system for inputs
      Returns:
      Bo (dimensionless)

      api - API gravity
      T - Temperature (in inputUnits)
      inputUnits - Unit system for inputs and outputs
      Returns:
      Dead oil viscosity (in inputUnits: cP for FIELD, Pa·s for SI/NEQSIM)
